comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.Name: Gaia the Dragon Champion
data.Effect: Fusion: "Gaia The Fierce Knight" + "Curse of Dragon"

data.Name: Pot of Greed
data.Effect: Draw 2 cards.

data.Name: Polymerization
data.Effect: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.

data.Name: Man-Eater Bug
data.Effect: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

data.Name: Monster Reborn
data.Effect: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

data.Name: Trap Hole
data.Effect: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

data.Name: Yami
data.Effect: All Fiend and Spellcaster monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Fairy monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

data.Name: Umi
data.Effect: All Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Machine and Pyro monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

data.Name: Exodia the Forbidden One
data.Effect: If you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

data.Name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One
Right Arm of the Forbidden One
Left Leg of the Forbidden One
Right Leg of the Forbidden One
Swords of Revealing Light
data.Effect: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but you must destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monster, flip all monsters they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsters cannot declare an attack.

data.Name: Raigeki
data.Effect: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

data.Name: Dark Hole
data.Effect: Destroy all monsters on the field.

data.Name: Fissure
data.Effect: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

data.Name: Black Illusion Ritual
data.Effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Relinquished". You must also Tribute a monster from your hand or field whose Level is 1 or more.

data.Name: Relinquished
data.Effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Black Illusion Ritual". Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card's ATK/DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead. While equipped with that monster, any battle damage you take from battles involving this card inflicts equal effect damage to your opponent.

data.Name: Thousand-Eyes Restrict
data.Effect:
Fusion: "Relinquished" + "Thousand-Eyes Idol"
Other monsters on the field cannot change their battle positions or attack. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card's ATK/DEF become equal to that equipped monster's. If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster instead.

data.Name: Invitation to a Dark Sleep
data.Effect: When this monster is summoned (excluding Special Summon), select 1 of your opponent's monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected monster cannot attack.

data.Name: Jinzo
data.Effect: Trap Cards, and their effects on the field, cannot be activated. Negate all Trap effects on the field.

data.Name: Dust Tornado
data.Effect: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

data.Name: Call of the Haunted
data.Effect: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

data.Name: Premature Burial
data.Effect: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

data.Name: Buster Blader
data.Effect: Gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster your opponent controls or is in their Graveyard.

data.Name: Skull Invitation
data.Effect: Each time a card(s) is sent to the Graveyard, inflict 300 damage to its owner for each card sent.

data.Name: Gravity Bind
data.Effect: Level 4 or higher monsters cannot attack.

data.Name: The Legendary Fisherman
data.Effect: While "Umi" is on the field, this card is unaffected by Spell effects and cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

data.Name: Axe of Despair
data.Effect: The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can Tribute 1 monster; place this card on the top of your Deck.

data.Name: Giant Germ
data.Effect: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, then you can Special Summon any number of "Giant Germs" from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

data.Name: Mystic Tomato
data.Effect: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

data.Name: UFO Turtle
data.Effect: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 FIRE monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

data.Name: Cyber Jar
data.Effect: FLIP: Destroy all monsters on the field, then both players reveal the top 5 cards from their Decks, then Special Summon all revealed Level 4 or lower monsters in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, also add any remaining cards to their hand. (If either player has less than 5 cards in their Deck, reveal as many as possible.)

data.Name: Upstart Goblin
data.Effect: Draw 1 card, then your opponent gains 1000 LP.

data.Name: Snatch Steal
data.Effect: Equip only to a monster your opponent controls. Take control of the equipped monster. During each of your opponent's Standby Phases: They gain 1000 Life Points.

data.Name: Confiscation
data.Effect: Pay 1000 Life Points. Look at your opponent's hand, select 1 card in it and discard that card.

data.Name: Delinquent Duo
data.Effect: Pay 1000 LP; your opponent discards 1 random card, and if they have any other cards in their hand, discard 1 more card of their choice.

data.Name: Rush Recklessly
data.Effect: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

data.Name: Mystical Space Typhoon
data.Effect: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

data.Name: Giant Trunade
data.Effect: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand.

data.Name: Gravekeeper's Servant
data.Effect: Unless your opponent sends 1 card from the top of his/her Deck to the Graveyard, he/she cannot declare an attack.

data.Name: Spellbinding Circle
data.Effect: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack or change its battle position. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

data.Name: Black Pendant
data.Effect: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

data.Name: Horn of the Unicorn
data.Effect: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK and DEF. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Return it to the top of the Deck.

data.Name: Black Skull Dragon
data.Effect: Fusion: "Summoned Skull" + "Red-Eyes Black Dragon"

data.Name: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
data.Effect: Fusion: "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"

data.Name: Big Eye
data.Effect: FLIP: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your Deck, then place them on the top of the Deck in any order.

data.Name: White Magical Hat
data.Effect: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand.

data.Name: Mask of Darkness
data.Effect: FLIP: Target 1 Trap in your GY; add that target to your hand.

data.Name: Suijin
data.Effect: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

data.Name: Kazejin
data.Effect: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

data.Name: Sanga of the Thunder
data.Effect: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

data.Name: Gate Guardian
data.Effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Sanga of the Thunder", "Kazejin", and "Suijin".

data.Name: Mystic Lamp
data.Effect: This monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

data.Name: Magician of Faith
data.Effect: FLIP: Target 1 Spell in your GY; add that target to your hand.

data.Name: Tribute to The Doomed
data.Effect: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

data.Name: Change of Heart
data.Effect: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

data.Name: Time Wizard
data.Effect: Once per turn: You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If you call it wrong, destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, take damage equal to half the total ATK those destroyed monsters had while face-up on the field.

data.Name: Thousand Dragon
data.Effect: Fusion: "Time Wizard" + "Baby Dragon"

data.Name: Heavy Storm
data.Effect: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

data.Name: Stim-Pack
data.Effect: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK. During each of your Standby Phases, the equipped monster loses 200 ATK.

data.Name: Share the Pain
data.Effect: Tribute 1 monster; make your opponent Tribute 1 monster (for no effect).

data.Name: Mirror Force
data.Effect: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

data.Name: Robbin' Goblin
data.Effect: Each time a monster you control inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, your opponent discards 1 random card.

data.Name: The Unhappy Maiden
data.Effect: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, the Battle Phase for that turn ends immediately.

data.Name: Sword of Deep-Seated
data.Effect: The equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF. If this card is sent to your GY: Place it on top of your Deck.

data.Name: Shield & Sword
data.Effect: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters currently on the field, until the end of this turn.

data.Name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
data.Effect: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

data.Name: Magic Jammer
data.Effect: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

data.Name: Solemn Judgment
data.Effect: When a monster(s) would be Summoned, OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Pay half your LP; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

data.Name: Witch of the Black Forest
data.Effect: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Witch of the Black Forest" once per turn.

data.Name: Thunder Dragon
data.Effect: You can discard this card; add up to 2 "Thunder Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.

data.Name: Twin-Headed Thunder Dragon
data.Effect: Fusion: "Thunder Dragon" + "Thunder Dragon"

data.Name: Castle of Dark Illusions
data.Effect: FLIP: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Zombie-Type monsters by 200 points. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the ATK and DEF of Zombie-Type monsters continues to increase by 200 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after the card is activated.

data.Name: Cocoon of Evolution
data.Effect: You can target 1 "Petit Moth" you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. While equipped by this effect, the original ATK/DEF of that "Petit Moth" becomes the ATK/DEF of "Cocoon of Evolution".

data.Name: Larvae Moth
data.Effect: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by offering "Petit Moth" as a Tribute on the 2nd of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

data.Name: Great Moth
data.Effect: This monster cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by Tributing "Petit Moth" on the 4th of your turns after "Petit Moth" has been equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

data.Name: Forest
data.Effect: All Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

data.Name: Kuriboh
data.Effect: During damage calculation, if your opponent's monster attacks (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle.

data.Name: Sangan
data.Effect: If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Sangan" once per turn.
